Body: Possible Duplicate:  How can I stop applications and services from running?  Some apps are necessary for notifications. For example, without the facebook process, there'd be no facebook notifications. But other apps, like Qik or Samsung MediaHub, don't need to be running be I don't use them at all whatsoever, and i do not receive notifications from them!!!!How do I stop that? Not just kill apps, but prevent them from ever starting without rooting?
Title: How do you prevent pre-installed (unremoveable) Android tasks/apps from ever starting without rooting your phone?

history.Text: For example, in GO Launcher's task killer, I can kill apps, but they keep coming back! How do I stop them?Some of them I suspect are necessary for notifications. For example, without facebook process, there'd be no facebook notifications. But others, like Qik for example, or SoundCloud, I don't want running or notifications or anything at all, but they come back by themselves!!!!How do I stop that? Not just kill apps, but prevent them from restarting?
How do you prevent Android tasks from starting?

history.Comment: deleted 85 characters in body; edited title

But other apps, like Qik or Samsung MediaHub, don't need to be running be I don't use them at all whatsoever, and i do not receive notifications from them!!!!How do I stop that? Not just kill apps, but prevent them from ever starting without rooting?
